resources.string: Access to account information is required to sign in.
Please join me for a friendly chat

The report service is not replacement for 911 or any emergency services. If you are in immediate danger of being hurt as a direct threat or a medical emergency, call 911 or the appropriate authorities immediately.
By using the report service, users are directly consenting to launching a third-party email client and sending the email to a list of recipients set by Nobuli Admin.

Cyberbullying or cyberharassment is a form of bullying or harassment using electronic means.

Cyberbullying and cyberharassment are also known as online bullying. It has become increasingly common, especially among teenagers, as the digital sphere has expanded and technology has advanced.

Cyberbullying is when someone, typically a teenager, bullies or hrasses others on the internet and other digital spaces, particularly on social media sites.
All conversation with the chatbot would be recorded for the purpose of learning and improving the chatbot. By continuing to use the service, you agree to the above statement.
